attributes.action: Annually increase the state pension regardless of country
attributes.background: Annually increase state pension regadless of where the pensioner lives

rejection.details:
You want something about the state pension to increase but it is not clear whether you want the age at which someone can claim their state pension to increase or the amount of money they receive to increase and by how much.

You could start a petition calling for the amount of state pension to increase by a certain value (£ or %) each year, if that is something you would like to happen.

You may like to sign this petition which call for the state pension to be paid at the equivalent of the National Minimum Wage: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302150.
